13512.content:
Widowmaker raced through the halls of the chemical building. She and Reaper had been sent in to locate a serum that could repare damaged body tissue. But when they got there, Mercy, Soldier 76, and Hanzo were already there. Reaper went to fight 76, while Widowmaker dealt with Mercy and Hanzo.

Quickly, she slinked into a nearby lab and waited. As soon as Hanzo stepped through the door, she fired a shot from her Widow's Kiss. It hit Hanzo in the arm, forcing him to duck back behind a wall. While Mercy healed him, Widowmaker took position behind a counter, preparing her next shot. Using her Infra-sight, she spotted Hanzo and Mercy entering, Hanzo ready to fire an arrow.

Widowmaker stood up and fired off three shots. One hit Mercy in the arm, one knocked her Caduceus Staff out of her hand, and one hit Hanzo's shoulder. This threw his aim off, sending the arrow flying a few inches to the right of Widowmaker. The arrow both ripped a small hole in Widowmaker's suit and broke a beaker full of some purple chemical, and it splashed on Widowmaker.

Just then, more shots were heard futher down the hall. Soldier 76 raced up and told Mercy and Hanzo that Talon agents had arrived and they needed to go now. Looking at Widowmaker, they left.

Reaper then entered the lab and looked at Widowmaker.

"We've got the serum. Let's report back." He said.

Widowmaker nodded and the two left. Unknown to Widowmaker, the chemical that was splashed on her seeped into her skin through the cut part of the suit.
------------------------
Back at Talon's main base, Widowmaker was in her room. She had sent her suit to be cleaned and repaired, and was now pacing in her room in underwear. She was thinking about how she would take out Hanzo and Mercy the next time they crossed paths.

As she paced, she caught sight of herself in the mirror. It was here that she noticed something was off.

She wasn't sure for certain, but in the mirror, it looked like her butt had grown. It wasn't much, only about 5 inches, but it was noticeable. It also looked like her hips and thighs had thickened as well.

As Widowmaker examined this, her expression became...

1352.content:
"I told reaper this was a bad idea" said the French lady waiting in the top of a building, widowmaker was talon best assassin, also known for her real name Amelie Lacroix was kidnapped by talon and brainwash to force her to kill her husband, the brainwash had not only turn Amelie into a murderer under the hands of talon like a puppet but it had also removed all of her emotions turning her into a cold person, the only emotion that she felt was the joy of killing, so she didn't only kill for orders but also to fill that void inside of her, a tragic story, from a loving girl with a group of friends that cared for her to a puppet. But with the new omnicrisis becoming more a reality than a speculation with each day that passes, and with the new overwatch forming and accepting practically anyone who wanted and could fight against the omnicrisis Talon saw an opportunity to take out two birds with one stone, they could eliminate any omnic and just give the excuse that they where part of the bad omnics and eliminate all of the overwatch agents from inside; So talon send two of their best agents, reaper and widow. At first they were rejected but after the agents of overwatch saw that they needed all the help possible they accepted the truce to "take out an enemy in common"'.

The first days were as widow expected, nobody talked or believed in her and it seemed as if she had somebody watching her 24/7, but after some time in which widow not only prove herself as a valuable member but also safe the life of a couple of agents, they started to treat her better, not even close to a friend, but they stoped watching her all the time and some even started to congratulate her for her good work from time to time, and as this became more often widow was starting to feel something, it wasn't happiness but rather joy, joy of just imagining the faces of her "teammates" when she shot them in their legs just to see them shiver in fear and their emotions, how betrayed and dumb they will feel, the amount of emotion that widow felt was something that she never felt before, specially when she imagine tracer, when she imagine her annoying grin turn into a face of complete horror, searching for somebody to go help her. It was just delicious

But while widow was emotionless she was by no means immune to common things, like hunger, and to her surprise, overwatch had one of the best and tastiest things she ever tried, and that's saying a lot coming from someone from France. Everything melt in her mouth it was the best thing ever, widow wasn't a girl who ate a lot but ever since she started working there she given got doubles sometimes, and not only that but mercy, being the caring that she is, packed every one with a big amount of food for the mission, but while most of them burned the extra calories running everywhere, widow was just lying down waiting for someone to come to her line of sight to shot it down, actually widow practically never exercised she just eat during the mission and back at the base.

And all those calories have to go somewhere



Which leads us to where we are now, widow was send into a mission to assassinate an omnic who could stop the war between robots and humans before it even started, widow wasn't a dumb girl she had analyze that place, she knew that the place where reaper had send her was a place where nobody ever went, despite her talk with him he insisted in her being there.

A couple of hours had pass: "I told reaper this was a bad idea, but he never listens to me. God, why is this suit so tight?" Widow was never a girl with huge muscles, she was in shape but she never got to the point of having a six pack, so the amount of weight that she put was showing really quickly, she had lost all the definition in her arms, legs and belly, and she had lost a lot of stamina, she got winded just on the way there, her arms were flabbier, her boobs didn't change at all, but it seemed that her belly and her ntirwe lower half absorbed all of the fat, her belly was starting to poke out, her thighs where starting to get dangerously close one to another, her hips where a little bit wider and softer, and her butt grow out like crazy, the two orbs of fat jiggle and threatened the fabric of her suit, it seemed like widow put at least 20 pounds on her frame

Suddenly a huge explosion happens in the building widow was watching, all the workers went running to her location, including her target, focusing in his head and with just one shot, bang, the robot fall to the ground

"Mission accomplished, damn I'm starving"

"I... I can't keep... going... I need... a break" said a very exhausted widowmaker
"what's wrong?" said the famous russian bodybuilder. Zarya. proclaimed one of the stronger, if not the strongest, womans in the world
"I don't *huff* I don't know why am I doing this, I'm a sniper, I work in the back, I find a position and I just stay there waiting for someone to come while you attack the enemy face to face, I don't need to keep doing laps and pushups" or at least that's what she wanted to belive, in reality the reason was that widow was actuallly unfit, the description that she gave was actually the reason for this, she didn't need to run o enter a fight one vs one, she just stayed in one place until an unsuspected victim appear and she kill them, all this mixed with her love for the food of the agency, made her put some pounds

"Ha... I... I told her... this is... a kids game" widow was exhausted, she was so out of breath, but her mind was only thinking in that delicious dinner that they will have in just some minutes

15432211.content:
It has been a while since Doomfist went ham on the city of Numbani. Quadrupedal robot bits were still being cleaned up along with general street and building maintenance from all of the punching and shooting. One of the ones helping to clean up the mess was Orisa. The omnic was very helpful in these tasks due to her strength and her graviton shots for gathering loose bits and parts. It also helped that she never really got tired.

After a while of lifting and placing the more intact OR15s into trucks, she would see one of the broken robots stand and walk into an alley slowly. Only Orisa noticed and only she followed behind. Strangely enough, this OR15 had a purple aura around it.

"Freeze. Please turn around and identify your model number and your..." Orisa started, but didn't finish as beepings and clinkings were heard. It was only seconds until she saw only purple with a matching de la dios muertos skull taking up the remainder of her vision and memory. She had fallen into Sombra's trap.

It didn't seem long until she came back to consciousness. She was running diagnostics on herself digitally and audibly. "Running diagnostics. Sensory systems online. Combat functions missing. Motor functions disabled. New equipment discovered."

Orisa would find herself paralyzed while standing and here gun arm replaced with a 3D printed duplicate. She would have also seen the c-cups made of a latex-like synthetic material along with a backside to match with the same material.

"Finally, la baca is awake..." Sombra said as she looked over the edited robot. Behind her was...
15432211.title: Orisa Meets Talon

choices: Test 1: Charging energy into bodymass making Orisa fatter
154322112.content:
"Sombra... what the hell you have done now?" Reaper's echoing unamused voice is heard behind Sombra. "Oh this? Just a little project of mine." Mexican hacker eyes Reaper, Moira and Maximillian over her shoulder as they arrive. Orisa's eyes scans around the people starting to worry. Maxmillian approaches Orisa eyeing the results. "Miss Colomar and Madam O´Deorain. You have done splendid work on this modification." Maxmillian moves her hand over the latex-like synthethic material. Orisa grunts over the sudden feeling, she can feel pain but this felt something else. A touch she could feel.

"Of course mister Maximillian, I oversaw the reprogramming sequences to her, so she can feel her new body unlike she could in past, and may I say Moira you did marvels on the bodily enchantments." Sombra chuckles giving pat onto Orisa's new "rear". "Other Omnics will pay us great deal to get themselves a more... organic-like modifications." Maximillian flips a coin between his metal fingers. "Do not doubt our work mister Maxmillian. Sombra and I did all required modifications and changes. I take great pride making her... body fluids a new and reaction nerves over the new assets." Moira speaks in her regal tone tapping her tall fingernails together.

"I request to know what you have done to me and what are these new equipment and installation." Orisa finally speaks out which Reaper responds by pointing his shotgun at her. "Stay silent or this operation ends before it starts." "Reaper. Stay your arm, this is operation of my funding. I would hate to see it go waste without results." Maximillian calms Reaper down which he responds with low muttering putting his shotgun away. "My apologies over my fellow associate, Miss. He lacks vision in this area. Now my dear kin you are going to be part of something great. Literally. Ah hah hah~" Maximillian chuckles flipping the coin and leaving the room with Reaper. As Moira and Sombra gathers around Orisa.

"Let us begin the tests miss Colomar." Moira walks over computer screen displaying the Orisa's new assets and all the tech that has gone into them. Sombra smirks at afraid Omnic preparing first test.
154322112.title: Moira, Reaper and Maximillian

1543222.content: A more lewd Orisa then. Why not. Well, we can't have 100% smut. Some story is needed as well. We got a couple options at least, so don't worry. She could want to be more human and experience food, bathing and such, or her new lewd bits malfunction in some way and could cause fluid build up somewhere. So, basically voluntary or involuntary.
1543222.title: AU Orisa

15433.content: To be playable, or not to be playable, that is the question.

choices: Over eating with all the excess fat settling in her chest.

15433211.title: Breast expansion.

1543322.content: Not a fan of the Ship sinker, huh? Well we still have more ladies to choose from. How about the double dealing exec from Russia, Katya Volskaya?
1543322.title: Next

info.brief_description: The women of Overwatch go through Big changes in different ways.
info.description:
The Women of Overwatch go through battles almost daily but what happens when something new happens that they never encountered before? It's time to see and find out.

No one liner chapters please.

No gore/vore/scat.

No Male interaction.

The Expansions are, Growth, Breast Enlargement, Butt Enlargement, Weight Gain, and more.

If you wish to add in Shrinking as well, then that is perfectly acceptable.

Make sure to have fun with the story and enjoy.

Here's a list of the Overwatch Characters as well.
http://overwatch.gamepedia.com/Heroes
